title: Office & Commercial Page

sub_fields.label: Use All Clients Posts
sub_fields.name: clients_use_all
sub_fields.instructions: If enabled, the marquee uses all Clients posts and their menu order.

sub_fields.label: Clients
sub_fields.name: clients_list
sub_fields.instructions: Select clients to include when Manual Select is chosen.

sub_fields.label: Use All Team Members
sub_fields.name: experts_use_all
sub_fields.instructions: If enabled, the section uses all Team Members posts and their menu order.

sub_fields.label: Team Members
sub_fields.name: experts_team_members
sub_fields.instructions: Select team members to include when Manual Select is chosen.

sub_fields.label: Heading Prefix
sub_fields.name: insights_heading_prefix
sub_fields.instructions: Text before the underlined word or phrase.

sub_fields.label: Heading Suffix
sub_fields.name: insights_heading_suffix
sub_fields.instructions: Text after the underlined word or phrase.

description: Fields for the Office & Commercial page
